title: Service Domain Schema
description: Schema for the Service domain in the Orthogramic Metamodel

title.description: The name or title of the Service

description.description: A detailed explanation of what the Service entails

purpose.description: The intended purpose or function of the Service within the Organization

owner.description: The individual or team responsible for the Service

orgUnitTitle.description: The Organization unit(s) to which the Service is linked

serviceLevelAgreements.description: Methods for gathering and implementing Service improvements

channels.description: Required resources for consistent Service delivery

customerFeedback.description: Identified risks to Service delivery and mitigation strategies

processFlow.description: How the Service supports Organization objectives and outcomes

customerJourney.description: Standards and procedures for ensuring Service quality

dependencies.description: Mapping of how value flows through the Service delivery process

stakeholderNetwork.description: Regulatory and Policy requirements affecting Service delivery

performanceIndicators.description: The name or title of the Service element

continuousImprovement.description: A detailed explanation of what the Service element entails

resourceManagement.description: The intended purpose or benefit of the Service element

riskManagement.description: The individual or team responsible for the Service element

strategicAlignment.description: The Organization unit(s) involved in the Service element

qualityFramework.description: The SLAs associated with the Service element

valueStream.description: The channels through which the Service is provided

complianceRequirements.description: The methods for collecting and analyzing customer feedback

serviceFeature.description: Features or components of the Service

title.description: The sequence of activities and interactions that comprise the Service delivery

description.description: The touchpoints and experiences throughout Service delivery

purpose.description: Other Services systems or resources required for Service delivery

owner.description: Services that are connected to or support this Service element

orgUnitTitle.description: Metrics used to measure Service effectiveness and value delivery

serviceLevelAgreements.description: Methods for ensuring Service quality and consistency

channels.description: Resources needed to deliver the Service element

customerFeedback.description: The name or title of the performance metric
